set-default_command_desc: Set the default address that the command '/serverinfo' will use.
server-info_command_desc: Returns information about a specific server.
language_command_desc: Change the language of the bot.
default_address_not_assigned: Default address is not assigned. Use /setdefault 'address' to assign it.
specified_language_not_supported: Specified language is not supported. Supported languages:
help_embed_bot_info_value: MC Server Info is a discord bot that returns information about a minecraft server.
help_embed_/server-info_value: Will return information about a specific minecraft server. Can be use without specifying the address if you set a default address with '/set-default'.
help_embed_/set-default_value: Set a default address that the bot will use if you don't specify an address using '/server-info'.
help_embed_/language_value: Change the language of the bot. Supported languages:
unreachable_server_embed_field: Server is offline or doesn't exist.
